posts.message:
[align=center][IMG]http://puu.sh/1Frd4[/IMG][/align]

The edition you are currently reading is the [color=#ff3131][b]123rd[/b][/color] [color=white][b]full[/b][/color] [color=#1fff1f][b]edition[/b][/color]. To read any older editions of HF News, please go [url=http://goo.gl/pxojJ]here[/url]. 

[align=center][img]http://puu.sh/1FqA6[/img][/align]
[color=white][b][color=#ff3131]Christmas Ti[/color][color=white]me for Hac[/color][color=#1fff1f]k Forums[/color][/b][/color]
Well, it's already here. The Christmas banner is up, the threads are everywhere; you can't escape it. It's Christmas time at Hack Forums. Everyone seems to be generally in a happy mood. Whether you hate it or not, it seems to have relaxed everyone a bit around the site. So go ahead and indulge yourself in one of the dozens of Christmas threads; bragging about your gifts, gifts you have bought for others, or maybe even showcasing a good deed done for someone else in the name of Christmas. Whatever your opinion is about this time of year, you can't deny it: Christmas has a profound effect on the culture of this very special site. On top of that, [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#4DD0FC][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] has released a jolly youtube video for you to enjoy, see it [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VutTgh0J-7w]here[/url]. Merry Christmas!

[b][color=white][color=#ff3131]Server [/color][color=white]Problems/[/color][color=#1fff1f]Downtime[/color][/color][/b]
This week, the site continued to face downtime for extended periods of time, at one point for four hours. These crashes have been attributed to memory limitations. [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#4DD0FC][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] is currently in the process of upgrading the servers but is waiting for the datacenter to clear up some memory.    

[b][color=white][color=#ff3131]Omniscient [/color][color=white]Runs Hou[/color][color=#1fff1f]secleaning[/color][/color][/b]
Site-owner [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#4DD0FC][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] spent the last week doing some housecleaning for the forums. All zero post members were deleted, while old PMs were pruned. This is a regular occurrence that takes place every now and then to free up some much needed space. [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#4DD0FC][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] also tweeted that he had finished a month worth of UB3R applications that had stacked up onto his workload. He also revealed that most members he reviewed were denied. He also revealed that he had averaged around an incredible 200 PMs per day in the past six months.

[align=center][img]http://puu.sh/1Fqwv[/img][/align]

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=888979][b]Aurora[/b][/url] -  [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=3099371][b][color=#1fff1f]Biggest CPA / PPD Comprehensive Guide with SEO Tips![/color][/b][/url]

[align=center][img]http://puu.sh/1FqJV[/img][/align]
[size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][color=#ff3131]Interview[/color] [color=white]-[/color] [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#1fff1f]Cody[/color][/url][/font][/size]
[spoiler=]
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=827711][color=#1fff1f][b]+Entity[/b][/color][/url]: For the 123rd edition, we've hunkered down in our anti-apocalypse castle to interview Cody. Any shoutouts you want to make to friends?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#ff3131][b]Cody[/b][/color][/url]: I'm more than glad to be here. I'd like to give a special shout out to Daisy, each and every member of 143, Nidhish & Vegeta. I'd also like to thank +Entity for allowing me to be interviewed.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=827711][color=#1fff1f][b]+Entity[/b][/color][/url]: What gave you the idea for 143? The name and expression of the group is certainly the first of its kind.
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#ff3131][b]Cody[/b][/color][/url]: The full story can be found here: http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=2878191&pid=27294890#pid27294890 - but to shorten it up, it's something Daisy and I have used for a long time. We've joked in the past about owning a group of our own, but as groups were so expensive, we didn't think it would happen. Eventually we both got more and more into Hackforums, and that's when Omniscient was contacted. This was before groups were no longer allowed to be purchased, and that's how we became the last purchased Hackforums group. We decided that 143 would be a perfect name for our group, especially with the meaning behind it, and what kind of group we wanted to be. We were both surprised by all of the support we received.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=827711][color=#1fff1f][b]+Entity[/b][/color][/url]: How did you get the money to purchase the group?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#ff3131][b]Cody[/b][/color][/url]: Contrary to popular belief, 143 is not owned by me. It is owned by Daisy. Although I am helping out with some payments, I do not think she would like to publicly state where the money came from.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=827711][color=#1fff1f][b]+Entity[/b][/color][/url]: No problem. How did Daisy choose to work with you versus other members?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#ff3131][b]Cody[/b][/color][/url]: That's something else that other people get confused about. People think we are in some 'Hackforums relationship' - though we've known each other for years and have been together longer than we've both been on Hackforums. We're in a LDR and have been in one for 9 months, though in the past we had been together for a year. We had discussed owning a group but never really had a serious discussion about it, and then boom, all it took was a serious discussion, some PM's, and we were set to own a group together.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=827711][color=#1fff1f][b]+Entity[/b][/color][/url]: Do you know each other IRL, or are you related online?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#ff3131][b]Cody[/b][/color][/url]: We don't. She lives in Alabama, and I live in Canada. We've not met yet, but we do hope to (we will, soon). Although many people criticize our relationship, we're not worried about what others think at this point. While on Hackforums we focus on ourselves, those that matter & 143.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=827711][color=#1fff1f][b]+Entity[/b][/color][/url]: How have you been able to cultivate such a benevolent and generous atmosphere around the ground? It's contagious, for lack of a better word.
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#ff3131][b]Cody[/b][/color][/url]: We've both always been generous people. Her more so than myself, but giving to others and back to the community is something that we have done here for a while now and plan to do so for a long time. 143 is a group about giving, regardless of what form it may be. We don't care if a user gives by helping people, or by holding $1,000 contests - both are the same in our eyes. 143 has helped us both in the long run, mostly because of what has become of the group. We're more of a family than a group, and that's something majority of 143 members will tell you.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=827711][color=#1fff1f][b]+Entity[/b][/color][/url]: Is there anything specific you look for in prospective 143 members? Or is it a specific quality that can't quite be described?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#ff3131][b]Cody[/b][/color][/url]: For sure a specific qualities that can't be described. There is not one specific quality, but many that we look for in members. We also need to both agree that the member is right for the group. If something seems off about the member, something usually is. Of course we've had a few members removed, a few members leave - but that was expected when the group came out. We're still a new group and with all things good come not-so-good things. Although we lost a few members, we gained a few more great members.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=827711][color=#1fff1f][b]+Entity[/b][/color][/url]: Do current group members often vote on prospective members, or is it entirely up to you and Daisy?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#ff3131][b]Cody[/b][/color][/url]: A nomination type thread or system was discussed, but Daisy and I decided against it. At the moment, and more than likely always, Daisy and I hand-select members ourselves and 'check them out' on our own. When 143 was launched, we did have Yellows help us with the first wave of invites, though. Other than that, who's invited is entirely up to myself and Daisy.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=827711][color=#1fff1f][b]+Entity[/b][/color][/url]: Do you and Daisy handle all 143 affairs, or do you have co-leaders?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#ff3131][b]Cody[/b][/color][/url]: At the beginning of 143, Yellows was pretty much our RHM. We both do trust him very much, and if something comes up we can count on him to help out. Although we don't have an official co-leader, and we never will (it will always remain only Daisy and I as leaders) - Yellows is someone that has always been there to give us a hand, even before 143. As of late, we've all been working as a group to sort any issues.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=827711][color=#1fff1f][b]+Entity[/b][/color][/url]: Everyone in the group votes on new ideas, giveaways, and initiatives. Is that correct?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#ff3131][b]Cody[/b][/color][/url]: We've got a thread titled "Group Activity/Project Discussion" where members can come up with new ideas or projects that as a group we can all work on together. So far, we've had a total of 8 projects. We've also got a thread for 'Group Suggestions' that members can use to help us improve as a group or if they think something should be added/changed/looked into.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=827711][color=#1fff1f][b]+Entity[/b][/color][/url]: You've put a lot of work into the group, Cody. Impressive. What future plans does 143 hold for the rest of the forum?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#ff3131][b]Cody[/b][/color][/url]: I have, for sure. Daisy and I both have a large portion of our time into 143. We want it to be the best it can be. I do personally want to thank all of our members for helping us make 143 what it's become, though, as without them it would be nothing. When it comes to future plans, we're for sure going to keep doing what we're already doing, and hopefully more.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=827711][color=#1fff1f][b]+Entity[/b][/color][/url]: Glad to see that 143 has some plans in store for us. Any closing comments for the readers?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1172544][color=#ff3131][b]Cody[/b][/color][/url]: I'd like to wish everyone happy holidays. Thanks.
[/spoiler]

[size=large][font=Monotype Corsiva][color=#ff3131]Interview[/color] [color=white]-[/color] [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=545127][color=#1fff1f]Joey Tribbiani[/color][/url][/font][/size]
[spoiler=]
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1018876][color=#1fff1f][b]Phytrix[/b][/color][/url]: Welcome to the 123rd edition of the HF News, Joey Tribbiani! As a customary, any shoutouts?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=545127][color=#ff3131][b]Joey Tribbiani[/b][/color][/url]: Too many to list, except for Sir. He's the best.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1018876][color=#1fff1f][b]Phytrix[/b][/color][/url]: I assume you've been asked this many times, but where did your username come from? Does it have any subliminal meaning, or is it simply because your a fan of Friends?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=545127][color=#ff3131][b]Joey Tribbiani[/b][/color][/url]: It's simply because I am a fan of the TV series.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1018876][color=#1fff1f][b]Phytrix[/b][/color][/url]: While we are on the topic of TV series, what TV series do you enjoy and why?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=545127][color=#ff3131][b]Joey Tribbiani[/b][/color][/url]: I currently enjoy watching Castle, HIMYM, TBBT, White Collar, The Newsroom and Game Of Thrones. One of my favorite shows from the past apart from Friends is House M.D.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1018876][color=#1fff1f][b]Phytrix[/b][/color][/url]: Being a leader of The Reviewers, what do you feel makes a good ebook or product? Over your time, I'm sure you've learned how to spot something that is appealing and things that are destined to fail.
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=545127][color=#ff3131][b]Joey Tribbiani[/b][/color][/url]: Originality and depth (quality and quantity respectively).

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1018876][color=#1fff1f][b]Phytrix[/b][/color][/url]: And what kind of leader would you consider yourself? A strict one, an analytical one...?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=545127][color=#ff3131][b]Joey Tribbiani[/b][/color][/url]: The type that would do whatever it takes to get the job done.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1018876][color=#1fff1f][b]Phytrix[/b][/color][/url]: What advice would you give to any new users joining HF?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=545127][color=#ff3131][b]Joey Tribbiani[/b][/color][/url]: Gain and contribute whatever you can. Keep a safe distance from drama and addiction.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1018876][color=#1fff1f][b]Phytrix[/b][/color][/url]: Which HF members have made a mark on your HF journey and how?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=545127][color=#ff3131][b]Joey Tribbiani[/b][/color][/url]: The list is literally never ending. Right from the person who answered my starting questions to the leaders who gave me a chance and taught me the traits, everyone has played a role, big or small, in helping me make my mark on HF.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1018876][color=#1fff1f][b]Phytrix[/b][/color][/url]: What do you wish you could abolish from HF if you had the opportunity?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=545127][color=#ff3131][b]Joey Tribbiani[/b][/color][/url]: Abolish? Nothing.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1018876][color=#1fff1f][b]Phytrix[/b][/color][/url]: Are there any particular goals that you have for your future on HF? If so, what are they?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=545127][color=#ff3131][b]Joey Tribbiani[/b][/color][/url]: I do not have any goals per se. I seize whatever opportunity comes in front of me during my journey.

[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1018876][color=#1fff1f][b]Phytrix[/b][/color][/url]: Thanks for the interview today Joey Tribiani. Anything you'd like to add before I let you get back to things?
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=545127][color=#ff3131][b]Joey Tribbiani[/b][/color][/url]: Everybody lies. ✌
[/spoiler]
posts.subject: [12/25/12] - HF News - Christmas Edition

posts.message:
[align=center][img]http://puu.sh/1FqGV[/img][/align]
[b][color=#ff3131]Intro[/color][color=white]duc[/color][color=#1fff1f]tion[/color][/b]
As you all can see, the HackerCraft News section for the HF News will be officially launched this edition. Firstly, I'll briefly introduce the section and its writer. I, Phytrix, will be writing the HackerCraft News section - at least for now and the forseeable future. This section will explore the most prominent weekly happenings in Hackercraft, and will also showcase various popular and/or notable threads. For those of you that don't know what HackerCraft is, it's HF's official Minecraft server. It has a dedicated subforum that can be seen [url=http://hackforums.net/forumdisplay.php?fid=252][b]here[/b][/url]. I was selected for this job as I myself am a very active Hackercraft player and can analyse the weekly happenings, having written various articles in various sections for the HF News in the past. I will attempt to be as unbias as possible in writing these articles. If you feel I am being bias, feel free to shoot me a friendly PM. Also, we don't need reports for this section. I'm more than capable of finding and analysing prominent events and threads in one select section. What better time for a new section?

[b][color=#ff3131]1.4.6 [/color][color=white]Up[/color][color=#1fff1f]date[/b][/color]
Well... talk about a rough update. Minecraft's new update, 1.4.6, was released earlier in the week and had a drastic effect on plugins, and in result, on MC servers including HC. [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#4DD0FC][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] juggled around constantly with plugins and bugs. He managed to learn a lot about plugins during these drastic times, spending hours upon hours actively on the HackerCraft server assisting users and managing plugins. Many plugins were removed and some modified/replaced. When the server was first updated from 1.4.5 to 1.4.6, [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#4DD0FC][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] realised that most plugins had yet to update, hence resulting in major bugs and broken plugins. The server was reverted to a blank, where users had no items and plugins. The server was relatively quickly reinstated, and without a much requested downgrade, the server went by on its merry way. Most plugins were updated within 24 hours or so, excluding the plugin which manages the /chest feature. [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#4DD0FC][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url] also scratched the NoCheat+ plugin for AntiCheat, which has enraged players. That being said, it's thought that after settings are manipulated, AntiCheat won't be so much of a ho ho ho!

[b][color=#ff3131]Genuine and [/color][color=white]Conception's Ho[/color][color=#1fff1f]liday Scavenger Hunt![/b][/color]
A few days ago, [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=646916][b][color=lime]Genuine[/color][/url][/b] (Genbti) and [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=588904][color=#0066FF][b]Conception[/b][/color][/url] (digitalconcept) from TheCompany posted a thread about a Christmas scavenger hunt that they were hosting to all members of HackerCraft! The thread aroused the inner pirate in many of us as various users took to the biomes in their boats and boots, some with the extra assistance of swiftness potions and other advantages (you know what I mean). As of yet, the treasure remains untouched. Four images were released on the thread: one of the loot, and three of the area. The target for aspiring or already active adventurers is a large Christmas tree, dotted with various valuable blocks, such as diamond blocks, emerald blocks, iron blocks, gold blocks and glowstone. There is also a beacon and chests full of enchanted armour, tools, weapons, ores and other valuables. The thread can be seen [url=http://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=3118340][b]here[/b][/url], and be sure to thank TheCompany for an even more enjoyable holiday season! Good luck adventurers.

[align=center][img]http://puu.sh/1FqPt[/img][/align]
[color=white][b][color=#ff3131]New Xbox Ru[/color][color=white]mored to be [/color][color=#1fff1f]in Beta Stages[/color][/b][/color]
The next Xbox might be out in Beta according to the latest batch of rumors. Sources state that the next generation Xbox is finally in beta development and that developers are waiting for the dev kits. "Xbox 3 is officially Beta, congrats," Twitter user SuperDAE wrote in a since deleted tweet captured by Gamechup. "Awaiting kits arrival to door." Microsoft hasn't confirmed anything yet, however the next generation console could be revealed sometime next year.

[color=white][b][color=#ff3131]iOS Game wi[/color][color=white]th Xbox LIV[/color][color=#1fff1f]E Achievements[/color][/b][/color]
Yes, that is right - a new iOS game with Xbox LIVE achievements! Microsoft released the game "Wordament" earlier this week on iOS devices. The game comes with ten achievements worth 50 gamer scores and it allows you to play via your Xbox LIVE account or as a guest. Players will play against other people on iOS, Windows Phone and Windows 8. The game is free-to-download on the App Store right now, and is compatible with the iPhone (from 3GS onwards), iPod Touch (3rd generation onwards) and iPad (iOS 4.3 onwards). Could we see more iOS games with Xbox LIVE achievements soon? Only time will tell!

[color=white][b][color=#ff3131]Win Xbox [/color][color=white]LIVE Ava[/color][color=#1fff1f]tar Gear[/color][/b][/color]
Do you want to win Xbox LIVE Avatar Gear? It's very easy to enter - all you need to do is post what you think YOUR Game of the Year was. There were many good titles this year so I would like to know your top game for 2012! This competition will have two winners that are randomly selected.

[align=center][img]http://puu.sh/1FqQ2[/img][/align]
[b][color=#ff3131]Is North Kore[/color][color=white]a Targeting t[/color][color=#1fff1f]he United States?[/color][/b]
South Korean officials reported on Sunday, after seeing North Korea launch a long range missile, that North Korea could possibly be capable of landing a missile somewhere on the US' west coast. A South Korean Defense Ministry spokesman said, "As a result of analyzing the material of Unha-3 (North Korea's rocket), we judged North Korea had secured a range of more than 10,000 km in case the warhead is 500-600 kg." North Korea's rocket launch on December 12th propelled a satellite into orbit. Opponents of North Korea claim that the launch is one stop closer to them developing nuclear missile technology.

[b][color=#ff3131]Egypt's Consti[/color][color=white]tution Likely to Be[/color][color=#1fff1f]come Official[/color][/b]
A referendum in Egypt is said to show that the majority of Egyptian citizen approve of the drafted Constitution. In fact, it was said to be a rough 64% approval rating. The committee overseeing the referendum will likely hear appeals until Monday before declaring the official results. The Muslim Brotherhood publicly stated that the official approval of the Constitution is "a historic opportunity to unite all national powers on the basis of mutual respect and honest dialogue for the sake of stabilizing the nation." There is still a minority of people who oppose the Constitution which contains Sharia law in it and one critic said, "They are ruling the country, running the vote and influencing the people, so what else could we expect."

[color=white][b][color=#ff3131]Russia Intro[/color][color=white]duces Sanct[/color][color=#1fff1f]ions on US[/color][/b][/color]
Russian legislators have introduced proposed laws that will put a ban on U.S. citizens adopting Russian babies. These could come as a concern to many US citizens who were aspiring to adopt a Russian baby. Patrick Ventrell said, "The United States is concerned by measures in the bill passed in the Russian Duma today that, if it becomes law, would halt inter-country adoptions between the United States and Russia and would restrict the ability of Russian civil society organizations to work with American partners"

[b][color=#ff3131]"1 Million New Doc[/color][color=white]uments" Says [/color][color=#1fff1f]Julian Assange[/color][/b]
WikiLeaks founder Julian Assange has publicly stated that the organization will release over 1 million new documents in 2013. Assange spent over six months in an Ecuadorian Embassy to avoid arrest by British authorities. The controversial man stated, "This building .. has become my home, my office and my refuge...thanks to the principled stance of the Ecuadorian government and the support of its people, I am safe in this embassy to speak from this embassy."

[align=center][img]http://puu.sh/1FqQC[/img][/align]
[color=white][b][color=#ff3131]Sa[/color][color=white]ms[/color][color=#1fff1f]ung[/color][/b][/color]
A new exploit has been found on Samsung. A XDA developer found the exploit when he was experimenting to find a new way to root his Samsung Galaxy S3. This was found with the handle 'alephzain' which lies in Exynos 4 which is the RAM system used for Samsung smartphones. This exploit allows users to access any app to extract data from RAM injecting malicious code into the Kernel. This however was not present in the Nexus 10 as it uses Exynos 5. Samsung announced that they're working to fix this exploit and said, "Samsung is aware of the potential security issue related to the Exynos processor and plans to provide a software update to address it as quickly as possible. The issue may arise only when a malicious application is operated on the affected devices; however, this does not affect most devices operating credible and authenticated applications. Samsung will continue to closely monitor the situation until the software fix has been made available to all affected mobile devices."

[color=white][b][color=#ff3131]Fac[/color][color=white]eb[/color][color=#1fff1f]ook[/color][/b][/color]
Facebook is working on a new Timeline. They confirmed to the ABC News stating that they're working on this with a small percentage of people and that they're doing it to make Timeline even more easier for their users. ABC has said that this will bring us a new Timeline that includes a tabbed look, allowing users to switch between friends, photos, and a person's About page. In addition, Facebook's current method of displaying Timeline updates by placing them in two columns has been modified to show updates on the left and friend and photo information on the right side. Last week, Facebook has added a new "Facebook Privacy" button in order to ensure that the users find it more easier to edit their privacy settings. Note that they have not made any changes to what their users can edit the settings to.

[color=white][b][color=#ff3131]Mic[/color][color=white]ros[/color][color=#1fff1f]oft[/color][/b][/color]
Microsoft's newest tablet Surface Pro is arriving soon. The Surface Pro is going to be the first tablet on earth with 64-bit computing and will be powered with Intel Core i5 Ivy Bridge processors. BitLocker security has been added which encrypts your hard disk's data. This tablet comes with a pen which is useful for business users, a mini display port through which you can your device to high resolution displays and a 10.6-inch display screen. The tablet also include several other ports such as Micro SDXc, USB 3.0, headphone jacket and cover port. This tablet has high expectations and is estimated to be one of the highest computing tablets to date.

[color=white][b][color=#ff3131]Yo[/color][color=white]uT[/color][color=#1fff1f]ube[/color][/b][/color]
This week, YouTube had one of its videos making a new record. 'Gangnam Style' by Psy has blown off roof tops and has reached a new record of one billion views. This is the first video to reach such a milestone. Before this achievement was reached, it was Justin Bieber's 'Baby' which was the most viewed video with around 803 million views. But 'Gangam Style' has broke this record in a mere five months. Wordstream reports say that this video has been viewed 4000 times every minute. "Gangnam Style" has also earned a Guinness World Records title as the most-liked video in YouTube history with over two million thumb ups. Here is the video: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9bZkp7q19f0]link[/url].

[color=white][b][color=#ff3131]Ve[/color][color=white]ri[/color][color=#1fff1f]zon[/color][/b][/color]
A bit of a story has blown up over the last week, as our very own [url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=651337]Tibit[/url] has claimed responsibility for hacking Verizon of nearly three-million customers' data. More specifically, Verizon FiOS customers. After releasing around three-hundred thousand entries of data, news websites took it off the ground. He has claimed that he let Verizon know of their discrepancy, and was only ignored. It would seem that Verizon is now doing as all corporate companies do: denying everything. One thing we know for sure, is that the data is real. It has matched several customers, and others have verified it. Yet, the saddest part of all, is that it was all stored in plain-text. That's right, no encryption. 

[align=center][img]http://puu.sh/1FqRt[/img][/align]
[b][color=#ff3131]Gang[/color][color=white]nam S[/color][color=#1fff1f]tyle[/color][/b]
Gangnam Style just became the first YouTube video to have more than 1,000,000,000 views on Youtube. The video made its debut on Youtube on July 15 and surpassed Bieber's "Baby" video in November. However, Justin Bieber's music label won't be too upset as PSY has been working for the same company since September. PSY's 'Gangnam Style' video reached one billion views on December 21st, the day the world was supposed to end.

[color=#ff3131]"What are you lo[/color][color=white]oking forward to dur[/color][color=#1fff1f]ing this holiday season?"[/color]

[i]"This holiday season, I am truly looking forward spending time with my 
family these holidays. I am also looking forward to Christmas day/night, because 
every Christmas me and my family, go down to a local church in my town, and 
serve dinner to the less fortunate in my community, but it isn't only people that 
are less fortunate, its people that don't have family in the area, and they just 
want to go meet new people and stuff like that, I enjoy doing it every year 
because, every year I get to be one of the cooks, and I love cooking), but I 
love the feeling I get after I go down there and volunteer my time. But I especially 
can't wait for new years eve, my best friends birthday is new years day, so he's 
throwing a massive party, meaning I get to see all of my friends before a lot of 
them head back off to college. "[/i]
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=525019][i]-illuminati‌[/i][/url]

[align=right][i]"This holiday season is going to be a good holiday season. I am getting 
all my relatives presents, and hopefully receive some too. I am also planning to stay at 
home, and study for exams (unfortunately) while trying to make some real, solid money 
over the internet."[/i]
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1182769][i]-iDiv[/i][/url][/align]

[i]"The only thing I look forward to during the holidays, is family time. My family 
had been through a lot, and as a result we're much closer then most 
families. We don't celebrate Christmas or anything like that, but during the 
holidays we just gather, my mother, siblings, and sometimes close friends, 
and just eat together. I find time together is richer then any material thing.
A smile or hug is much grander then new shoes, or handfuls of money. 
Family time is what I look forward too, nothing can brighten up my day, like
my family together, happy. "[/i]
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=879431][i]-Pali[/i][/url]

[align=right][i]"There are several things I look forward to. Every year after Christmas 
eve, we go to my grandmother's house. All my cousins will be there, it's gonna be great 
being together again! And of course the food.. I have a tendency to eat a bit too much, 
my grandmother's fault :)."[/i]
[url=http://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=846602][i]-Karate Skid[/i][/url][/align]

[align=center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qKkRc.gif[/img][/align]
[i]The Corporation[/i] is a group of innovators, those who bring quality products to the marketplace and are known for their business prowess. It is one of three marketing related groups on the forum, along with [i]The Marketers[/i] and [i]illuminati.[/i] The group was originally owned by [b]Tibit[/b], who passed ownership of the group to [b]Aeon ‹3[/b]. Group leaders look for popular figures in the marketplace, those who are intelligent programmers, smart businessmen and amazing innovators. 
The group was founded on November 29th, 2012 by [b]Tibit[/b] and [b]Aeon ‹3[/b] after having been purchased from [b]Positive[/b] for an undisclosed sum of money. [i]The Corporation[/i] used to be known as [i]Rhythm[/i], a music related group, until its purchase. The group is 100% invitation only, and will not have an open recruitment or pay-for-spot system in place in the future. 

[i][size=xx-small]This section will be used for all new, updated, and changed groups. TERROR will be here soon.[/size][/i]
